summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 38th Ave. Northeast from Northeast 65th St. to Northeast 75th St.; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same all in accordance with Resolution No. 18539 of the City Council of hte City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
